Sizing
Sizing listed below is based on information provided by our manufacturers. Not all manufacturers sizing are uniform. European sizing is generally smaller for the equivalent American size. As an example, Italian made clothes are generally tighter and therefore, one needs a larger size than an American sized garment. Bicycle sizing is not the same from one company to the other. Use the chart links below to find the appropriate frame size.
